summary: Completed comprehensive testing of DigiForge SaaS platform. Backend APIs mostly functional (7/8 tests passed), frontend UI working correctly with successful auth flows and navigation. One critical issue with AI product generation service.

critical_bugs.issue: AI product generation fails with 502 Bad Gateway error from LLM service
critical_bugs.impact: Users cannot generate digital products - core functionality broken

working_endpoints: /api/products - Product listing working (returns empty array for new users)

integration_issues.issue: 3-step wizard UI works perfectly but fails at final generation step due to backend AI service error

working_features: Landing page loads correctly with all sections
Auth page with login/register toggle working
JWT registration and login flow working
Dashboard page loads with user data
Credits display working (shows 10 credits for new users)
Empty state for products displayed correctly

passed_tests: Auth page functionality and form validation
Dashboard page load with user data
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix AI product generation service. The LLM integration is returning 502 Bad Gateway errors, preventing users from creating digital products. Check EMERGENT_LLM_KEY configuration and LLM service connectivity. This is the core feature of the platform and must be resolved.

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all UI working, 1 integration issue due to backend)
